channel.title: Modify Watches: New Products - Sets - Classic Mini
channel.description: A list of the new products at Modify Watches.

item.title: Mini The Kitchen Sink
item.description:
1 of everything (Every. Single. Piece.) we sell as of 2/17/2012

Faces: Black, Silver, White, Blue, Pink, Green, Red Polka, Purple Polka, Green Polka, Domo, Wilson, Jeter, Gold, Purple, Orange, Cal, QR (no hands!)

Straps: Black, White, Lt. Gray, Slate Gray, Sky Blue, Dark ..

Price: $495.00
